test.instr: (:ins (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y table))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X bottle))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y closet))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X airconditioner))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red) (sort Y worktable)))) )
test.nl: The door of the closet is opened. Please put a can on the table. Please give human a bottle. Please put a book in the closet. Please put the black remotecontrol in the closet. Please close the closet. Please go to the airconditioner. There must be the red book on the worktable.
